phrases: Looks like it was not just you.
You tried going to school the other day.
Those girls did not really mean what they said.
I do not really care about that.
Nothing you or your friends say will affect my life in any way, shape, or form.
I was not trying to be cute.
I am not like my dad.
If that were to happen to you, too... with everything as it is...
Hey, Menma showed up at your place, right?
So, you did like Menma... did not you?
You can see something that no one else can because you really, really liked her... right?
You said it was fine to believe in her just a minute ago.
I do not really understand, but...
I do not really understand, but please.
So, we could not find her.
I wanted to see her, too!
Why were you up here by yourself?
When Menma appeared before me, she said,
Please do not make a bigger fuss out of this.
I could not make it out completely,
but do not you think it would actually bother her if all of you got worked up over some wish?
Ever since you all have gotten together and started to remember me...
I am a lot more happy!
Even if I am dead, I want everyone to get along!
Hey... if Menma said that, then maybe we should just stop.
That is not what I said.
Jintan's mom used to make that for us all the time.
Are you saying that a ghost made muffin bread?
Now that is definitely taking it too far.
Do not you think so, too, Hisakawa?
Er... I think it is pretty original, though.
I do not care if you think I am weird or crazy.
Menma's actually saying that she will be happy if we are still together.
That she will be happy if we do not forget about her.
You are forever obsessed with her.
Man, looks like I brought everyone down.
Everyone can eat the muffin bread together.
Then it will not really be everyone!
What was the Menma you saw like?
Let us see, she was in a white one-piece dress.
Did she have a small ribbon attached around this area?
I cannot really remember, but I think she may have...
You are such a mysterious girl, Tsuruko.
I wonder what the Menma that Yukiatsu saw was like.
If I am Mario Menma, then the other one must be Luigi Menma!
It would be fun if it was a 2-player game.
Man, what the hell was Yukiatsu saying?
Menma said not to make a fuss.
He is got one hell of an imagination.
I guess that applies to me even more so.
I cannot forget about it, though.
The way he twisted Menma's feelings...
So, you did like Menma... did not you?
We stopped by because we heard a good boy named Jinta lived here.
My good boy radar is going off!
We are a stuffed animal and a Kokeshi spirit!
You like Menma... do not you?
I am turning off the light.
A one-piece dress with a ribbon on the chest.
I am off to work, Touko.
Jintan, I think the bill collector will come today.
Give him the money from the top drawer.
There will be a string of hot days ahead, but as for me...
Wow, this guy thinks of some weird stuff.
she has not said anything about me not going back to school.
Oh, we are getting ready for the culture festival.
My class is doing an a capella kadaoke cafe.
Do not you think that is stupid?
Hey, why do you have the kotatsu on a wooden floor in your house?
You have to give your guest sweets!
Hey, all I have got are some cookies.
It was more stiff than the kind your mom made.
I think the flour was not sifted properly.
If you add baking powder, it will be more fluffy.
So its bad taste was not because it did not have raisins.
I did not know you could cook.
Anyone can cook if they know the recipe.
You just have to get the portions and timing right.
As long as you avoid stumbling in odd places that is.
I have a bad feeling about your visit.
I will cut to the chase.
I do not believe that Menma made this muffin bread.
How could I expect you to...
But that is exactly why I have a request for you.
So what do you think he said?
You smell great, but I bet your armpits smell even better!
I mean what kind of pick-up line is that?
You think he had an armpit fetish?
Sorry, I just remembered something I need to do!
Hey, do not you think Naruko's been kind of unsociable lately?
Yeah, I know what you mean.
It kind of pisses me off.
That is Yadomi, is not it?
Cannot you tell by looking at that lump of lethargy?
What are you doing out here?
It is a Super Peace Busters engagement.
Are you really going to do it?
Can you afford to stroll around town like this?
Menma kept bugging me to go outside.
Hey, tell me what the Menma you saw was like.
That is the wrong way to put it.
The Menma in my house is saying yours is a fake.
We are all going to the secret base now.
If you would like you can come too...
This is not like the old days when you played leader.
And even back then I did not acknowledge you.
Do not talk to me like we are friends, you whipped dog.
You did not have to go out of your way to come.
Bugs were biting me all over after the barbecue.
Why do not you show less skin?
You are not a whipped dog; you are a top dog.
So, either way, I am a dog.
Maybe the Menma that Yukiatsu saw is not fake.
Think about it, it would not be that strange for another Menma to exist.
After all, I do not even know why I am here.
Just hurry up and turn your headlight off, it is too bright.
My parents bought a new one at the bazaar.
I am sorry it is used, but you can use it here if you like.
You are such a good person.
And you even thought to bring cups...
I have a collection of them.
It really is fun when everyone is together.
Is that your hobby or something?
I have so much fun doing this with everyone.
I just think it is old-fashioned.
Let us let Menma drink some, too.
I thought about it after the barbecue.
Did not Menma say she would be happy if everyone got together?
I really get what she means.
She said she does not want to be forgotten, but it is not like we could ever forget her.
She is such a little worrywart.
Did I drink too much coffee?
I got to go to the bathroom!
You are forever obsessed with her.
Yukiatsu was talking about himself when he said all of that.
Hey, are you sure you saw her?
You know, about what Tsuruko mentioned.
It had a ribbon around here right?
A one-piece dress with a ribbon...
She was here a minute ago.
You can shave your legs, but you still have a man's body!
You can only go so far,
We still do not know the name of the flower we saw that day.
kimi to korogasu tsukaisute no jitensha
umi wo miwatasu saka wo kakenobotte
souyatte i am about to wa boku no hou e
mada futari wa sugu soko ni irunoni
Upon pages and pages of entries
We have put down all our emotions
But now I have hit a writer's block
I do not know how to finish this page anymore
Putting a bookmark in my diary
You and I go out to ride the bike we found in the dumpster
Let us go to our secret place
Where we piled up our bricks of memories
Run up the hill, where we can see the horizon
Where we can see the sky so fearfully blue
With cider in my right hand
My other hand helps me search for you
You used to come find me way back when
You used to demand me of so much more
You are both still standing right by my side
Yet why do I pray to see you both again?
There must be something off with me
kaerimichi no kousaten de koe wo kaketekureta ne
aa hanabi ga yozora kirei ni saite chotto setsunaku
aa kaze ga jikan to tomo ni nagareru
ureshikute tanoshikute bouken mo iro iro shita ne
futari no himitsu no kichi no naka
kimi to natsu no owari shourai no yume ookina kibou wasurenai
jyuunen no ato hachigatsu mata deaeru no wo shinjite
kimi ga saigo made kokoro kara arigatou sakendeita koto shitetayo
The fireworks blossomed heartrendingly beautiful across the night sky,
and time passed as swiftly as the wind.
We met in an unexpected moment
when you called out to me at the crosswalk,
We shared so many happy times and thrilling adventures
I will never forget the hopes and dreams we shared during that one summer's end.
I am sure we will meet again in another August, in maybe ten years time.
I could feel your heartfelt thanks all the way until the end.
And I know it must have been painful
to hold back your tears and say goodbye with a smile.
But those are my best memories.
Episode 4 A White One-Piece Dress with a Ribbon
